title: Allandra's Whelm
content:
Allandra's Whelm Rare 4~14 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+2 Piercing+1d4 Cold Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: When Allandra was a girl, she saw a hot spall of matter fire through the sky. She wished upon this falling star, but instead of getting an answer from the sky, she got one from the sea in the voice of Umberlee, goddess of the endless fathom. Trident Thrown Versatile 1.8 250

Allandra's Whelm

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d
